name: Kabab Mistri-Jaisingh Garh
about_restaurant: “An affair with food” is a glorious roof top restaurant developed by Chef Vimal Dhar, is a fine dine exposure for food lovers. It's a partially covered dining area with spectacular view of the Aravali hills and town, specializes in Indian and World Kababs with a hint of Asian cuisine, specially crafted to suite a wide range of taste buds. Also offers some of the very authentic and popular Rajasthani delicacies like jodhpuri chakki ki subzi, daal bati and choorma, sizzling tandoori kababs that are must for anyone visiting Udaipur. Guests are entertained with live Indian classical performances in the evenings in our restaurant. Kabab Mistri Restaurant is air conditioned and has a capacity to serve 60 guests comfortably. Restaurant Varandah is also beautifully done and is surrounded by lawns and arches. It can accommodate a decent strength of 30-40 guests. Roof top has the stunning views of lake and city palace with live ghazals which is performed in the evenings. A decent 40-60 guests can be easily served to order. Champa lawns : Hotel has two lush green party lawns to do a gathering from 100 to 200 guests as per the need of the theme guest. Recent events held in the lawns are on the themes like Nawabs, sit down thali and 5 course European meals, sizzler festivals and small wedding celebrations.
address: 3, Haridas Ji Ki Magri, The Trident Road, Shavri Colony, Udaipur-313001, Rajasthan India

name: Temptation
about_restaurant: The Temptation, Udaipur's most charming café and restaurant was set up to amaze with our services. The idea was to create a peaceful and lively space where people could have a wonderful meal, relax and feel rejuvenated, meet over aromatic coffees accompanied with delicious Pasta, exchange ideas over wholesome global cuisine and 'just be' in a friendly and aesthetic environment with friends and family enjoying nature's bounty. The Temptation offers an eclectic and a fun menu, with a good variety of refreshing drinks, light-snacks, main courses, soups and a few signature items such as the coffee magic, Italian Sandwich , Mediterranean cuisine, blended Ice-cream scoops, chocolate sensations, Sundays, smoothies, mock tails , Chinese cuisine, Pasta etc to fill their appetite. The menu has been put together by chefs who have worked with leading hotels and fine dining restaurants. The Temptation menu doesn't promise variety alone but quality as well.

about_restaurant:
Being an Indian means whenever we socialize, it's somehow always going to be accompanied by us putting food in our mouths. Zest is a safe haven where you can come in any time of day for a great; relaxing meal... we treat all our guests like VIPs, and take care to ensure that nothing interferes with their dining experience.”

name: Lal Bagh Hotel & Restaurant
about_restaurant:
A specialty restaurant with European sophistication and Asian flair, and an exhilarating menu waiting to be explored.

This unique restaurant introduces you; course by delectable course, to a novel cuisine prepared with carefully selected farm-fresh ingredients. You will break bread with unusual cooking styles, which bring out the subtle flavors inherent in the homegrown vegetables, and succulent meats. The cutting-edge techniques using steaming broths and versatile oils achieve a fine balance between indulgent flavors and healthful cooking. 

We have three dinning options i.e. Tented Common Dinning, Private Tent Dinning and Open Air Dinning. Each experience is so unique that you will love it.

                                                                   

                                                                       BAR 

Our Bar at Lal Bagh is the best place in Udaipur to chill out & have a great time with friend. Take a sip of you favorite drink and relax yourself with the soothing music. The ambiance is nice that once you enter the bar you'll feel like you are in a different world.

The Winos mystique is evident in the signature alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages made with organic fruit and vegetable juices and an extensive wine list.

The Winos at Lal Bagh offers you a wide selection of wines in Udaipur, and some of the finest Whiskeys and designer Vodkas making it ideal for entertainment and celebrations. The friendly service staff make it the best venue for a family outing too!
address: Sardarpura, Udaipur, Rajasthan 313001

name: Khammaghani
about_restaurant:
Khamma Ghani Restaurant surrounded by lakes of Udaipur. Khamma Ghani Restaurant, one of the most popular and best restaurant in Udaipur for it's services.

There’s a saying in India, “Athithi Devo Bhava”, which means “The Guest is God”. We Indians consider it our honor to have guests in our homes. There’s nothing like Indian hospitality. On your arrival at Khamma Ghani Restaurant, you are treated as an invited & an eagerly awaited guest rather than as a paying customer.
Khamma Ghani Restaurant is located at the edge of old city, on the lake rang sagar with the view of "The City Palace" and old town, with a convenient approach to main tourist attractions of Udaipur.

Khamma Ghani Restaurant having 5 star ambience is one of the best fine dining destination. Appealing to the eye this multi-cuisine restaurant does stimulate the senses fully. We serve delicious flavors from all across the globe… Traditional Indian, Chinese, Continental (Veg. & Non-Veg.) food with exotic range of mock-tails all under one roof with soothing environment. You will find the best place to dine with your friends & family.

We look forward to welcome you and your family to an adventure in a great dining, amid, astonishing surroundings!!!. There are 2 small Islands in front of khamma Gani Restaurant which attracts 100's of migratory birds, so it's a barabise for bird's lover

Rangsagar, pichloa
udaipur

name: Apni Dhani
about_restaurant: In Apni Dhani you will find a different theme for each day, a festive celebration every time in a different manner with a purview of real rajasthani village culture in fun, entertainment, games, thrill, shopping, rajasthani diet, Rajasthani Kalbeliya Dance or Ghoomer or other folk dance , music and much more to look... to feel... to breathe... to taste... to experience....

name: AQUA GRILL DEACTIVE
about_restaurant:
Great ambience and flavor full cuisine awaits at this multi cuisine restaurant , our chefs are delighted to offer unmatched experience of taste , quality and wholesome preparations.

Set beside the pool , this terrace open air restaurant opens views of the beautiful Aravali ranges , talk to our chefs on the live bar b que done to your perfection with great bar card selections.

title: A Family Restaurant
keyword: Best Place to eat in very economical Price.
description:
The Ambrosia as the meaning depicts in Greek and roman mythology the food of God thought to confer immortality, something with an especially delicious flavour or fragrance.
	To relish authentic North Indian cuisine in an international outfit, visit Ambrosia Family Restaurant at Crimson Park Shree Kanak Hotel.  Relax and enjoy, ease your toiling body of the daily tensions and hard work that has been keeping you off from a break. Known for its authentic food the Ambrosia Restaurant features a fresh, sophisticated design and an atmosphere idea for romantic dinner /lunch get together with friends and family...
	We offer guest to dine on the open air garden lounge. We have few tables and can only be offer this when weather permits.
	The restaurant is well known for offering high end services and quality food.
